ciso_ci_tammany_hall_creation_trigger = {
	always = yes
	state_region = s:STATE_NEW_YORK
}
ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger_heavy_industry
		any_scope_building = {
			level = 5
			is_building_group = bg_heavy_industry
		}
	}
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_heavy_industry_unions_creation_trigger_machinists
		pop_type_percent_state = {
			target = pop_type:machinists
			value = 0.025
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_royal_court_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_royal_court_creation_trigger_is_royal_capital
		is_capital = yes
		owner = {
			has_law = law_type:law_monarchy
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger = {
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger_manufacturing
		any_scope_building = {
			level = 10
			is_building_group = bg_manufacturing
			private_ownership_fraction = 0.2
		}
	}
	custom_tooltip = {
		text = ciso_ci_manufacturing_corporations_creation_trigger_capitalist_ratio
		pop_type_percent_state = {
			target = pop_type:capitalists
			value = 0.0025
		}
	}
	always = yes
}
